title: Cook, Serve, Delicious! Battle Kitchen Edition [FINAL-UPDATE] 20
description:
About Game:
************
Cook, Serve, Delicious is a hardcore restaurant sim, one of the few in its genre that gives the players total control over where they want to take their restaurant.

The game centers on an old, worn down restaurant in the SherriSoda Tower, which was once the heart of the building but closed down as business (and tenants) dropped to an all time low. But with the local economy rising back up and occupancy reaching its maximum, SherriSoda Tower has decided to bring back the old Cook, Serve, Delicious restaurant, and has given you complete control to bring it back to its old five star status of world class dining.

To do that, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll start with a few thousand dollars and thirty foods to choose from to put on your menu, as well as a host of restaurant equipment and more. Nearly everything is unlocked from the start of the game for you to purchase; this is your restaurant, and you must figure out the best strategy to get that restaurant packed with satisfied customers. Can you prove your culinary skills?

And if that werenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t enough, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll also have the opportunity to be cast in the Iron Cook television show, throw parties for offices in SherriSoda Tower, read virtual mail in your SherriSoda Tower Email account which ranges from game tips to crazy spam, from customers providing feedback to your restaurant to opportunities to being able to fund projects via Ã¢â‚¬Å“ClicknStartÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and other big surprises!

With hours of content and tons of secrets and unlockables, Cook, Serve, Delicious will provide a big challenge for anyone whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ready to take their crumbling, rat infested eatery to a luxurious Platinum Star Restaurant. Good luck!


Game Info:
***********
Ready 2 Play
Crack: Velocity/RAZZ
RePacked by: Foxy Games
Released: November 2014
Size: 110 Mb
Platform: PC / Windows
Genre(s): Time Management / Cooking

About Update:
**************
The game now correctly rewards you with the prize money earned if you beat more than one extra event in a row without going to the main menu.
A bug occurred with the dating scenario where not serving your date the proper food on your menu resulted in no customers for hours at a time.
The game would sometimes reset the corndog foods to not being purchased in the two star level restaurants.
Addressed some minor bugs and grammar issues.

* Here's all the improvements you'll see in the patch:

NEW FEATURES
*************

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Battle Kitchen Mode added! This new expansion is unlocked at the onset and is separate from the Campaign Mode. Some of the new modes include...

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Weekly Challenges (1 player)- Leaderboard time based challenges with a new challenge each week!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Strike Challenges (1-4 players)- Take on twelve brand new challenges on your own or Tag Team with 3 others locally! For the first time Specialty Foods are mixed into these challenges, and the gameplay has been tuned to provide the most difficult waves of food yet. Select between Standard Difficulty or Extreme Difficulty for an ever greater challenge!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Endurance Mode (1-4 players)- How far can you make it as endless waves of food pour into the kitchen? Not only that, but calls from Chef Risotto has you upgrading and switching out foods on the fly, providing a unique experience that's unlike anything else in the game.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢25 Indie Guest Stars- 25 characters from Indie Classics to up and coming great games have stepped into the Battle Kitchen! Unlock them by completing Strike Challenges, participating in a Weekly Challenge or going as far as you can in Endurance mode.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Campaign Co-op- play with a friend simultaneously in the main Campaign! One person cooks, and the other expedites the orders. Works with your current save and is a fun way to play the game with others!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢All new Statistics Menu- Three pages of detailed data that uses your current save, from how many pounds of meat you've served to a breakdown of each food you've made.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Enchiladas have been completely retooled to be more user friendly and faster to prepare (no more wait times needed for frying tortillas).

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢You can now select specific recipes to practice on in Practice mode.


NEW ADDITIONS/IMPROVEMENTS (ENGINE)
***********************************

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved controller handling when plugging/unplugging a controller during a game. You can also navigate options and gamepad menus using the controller, and no longer need a mouse for first time gamepad setups.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢A new "Load Game" option allows you to exit your current game to load a new save without having to quit and restart.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Utilized Game Maker's new audio engine and replaced all music with ogg files, so that there are now "clean" loops of music tracks.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Utilizes Game Maker's new engine improvements that addresses a rare bug that causes memory leaks for some video cards, leading to choppy performance over a short time. Also improves performance across all machines.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Implemented new render modes. Originally an option for "High Rendering" allowed the game to render at 1080p once restarted. Now there are three options: Standard Render (displays the game at 720p), High Render (displays the game at 1080p, is the new default option), 2K and 4K renders (upscales the game for resolutions above 1080p). These can be changed on the fly and no longer require a restart. These options significantly improve graphical quality for both windowed mode and for monitors above 1920x1080.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Engine improvements should fix an issue for some users that lead to crashing when going to fullscreen.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢You can now resize the game window in Windowed mode.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved audio cues for certain actions. Thanks to the Nerd3 Blindfold video that inspired me to make this slight adjustment!


NEW ADDITIONS/IMPROVEMENTS (GRAPHICAL)
**************************************

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢UI overhaul on many menus to better illustrate options and features, including buttons and what can be manipulated.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢HD assets added for food menu icons, email menu and other elements to improve graphical quality at fullscreen. Many food icons have been completely redone to better illustrate the foods as well.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Changed the visual look of the nachos, pizza, and burger bun tops for prep work.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved the six Food Pins design for achievements and in-game display. Also improved clicknstart/Love Chef achievement icons.


BUG FIXES
**********

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢The game no longer saves the options when switching to fullscreen mode, preventing infinite crash loops for some users.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Finally solved the rare food bug issue that caused foods to be given to the player without purchasing.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed the Steam Screenshot bug that caused odd outlines and incorrect alpha values in screenshots for Windows users.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢The Perfect Combos meter now correctly displays combos over 99 during gameplay.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Gamepad input display for Pasta have been corrected (left stick prompts).

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Smaller other bugs have been addressed.

Instructions:
**************
1.Download
2.Install
3.Play and Have Fun 
4.Keep Seeding!
